in our sites we like to reuse open contents and opensource code, but is right (and in some cases we must) give a attribution to authors.

Therefor… here’s the list:

Site

for the awesome mainsite we use the best onepage theme for jekyll by the great guy Travis Neilson: here’s the code on github here’s the best videolessons to create a jekyll’s site

for this beautiful doc-site we use the jekyll’s Hyde Theme but many tricks are by The MasterBlaster of Code Dr.Blaster (we love this guy!)

Images

the logo osd is mine (luca) like the background image
